name: Mario Free Fall
description:
Endless mobile game based on free falling physics. Main character is Mario. the game was developed using scratch blocks coding program.

Story: Mario was waking in the Mushroom Kingdom and he noticed strange footprints on the ground. He follows the footprints and all of a sudden falls in hole. Then the game starts.

Gameplay: Mario character is freefalling with obstacles running in his way.  The player should swipe the mobile screen right and left in order to avoid hitting the objects and losing lives.  The game starts with full 3 lives and can be refilled during the play by catching flying mushrooms.  The player will score points based on the distance travelled falling without losing all the lives.  High score is recorded and retry button appears to reattempt the game immediately once all lives are consumed. Players will be challenged to beat their best score every time which shall make the game addictive.
